simplifyExpression.name: Simplify Expression
simplifyExpression.desc: Will undistribute and perform available operations on the input.

doubleSidedSolve.name: Solve Double Sided Equation
doubleSidedSolve.desc: Will simplify and distill the given variable from the left side of the equation.

substituteVariable.name: Substitute Number For Variable
substituteVariable.desc: Will replace (substitute) all instances of the given variable with the given number and simplify the output.

factor.name: Factor number
factor.desc: Will get integer factors of number.

GCF.name: Get GCF
GCF.desc: Will get the greatest common factor of multiple numbers.

primeFactor.name: Get Prime Factorization
primeFactor.desc: Will return the prime factors of an integer

isPrime.name: Is Prime
isPrime.desc: Will determine if an integer is prime or composite.
